name: A Broken Halo - Demo
description:
A Broken Halo is a 2D Puzzle game. You play as Zime, an angel that had her Halo destroyed by an evil mage. Now, she has to recover the broken pieces of her Halo and destroy her nemesis. Is Zime going to survive this challenge?

Add A Broken Halo to your Steam Wishlist:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2052150/A_Broken_Halo/

Controls:

- WASD to move;

- Mouse click to interact with the menus;

- ESC to pause game

*If you get stuck by the colored barriers you can reset the game in the pause menu.
